text:
Hello Folks!

Kombai For Email just launched on Product Hunt!

:star2:Convert any email design to HTML code in just one click.
:rocket:Code output works across all major clients and ESPs 	

Our last Product Hunt launch in Aug was a huge success.
We ended the day with 1700+ upvotes, 13K DUV and 4K+ user signups.
Getting us the coveted #1 Product of the day, #1 Product of the Week,#1 Product of the Month and #1 Devtool of the Month.

It would mean everything to us to have members of this community support us again.

Please have a look, share your feedback and support us! :arrow_up_small:
<https://www.producthunt.com/posts/kombai-for-email>

And as always, our DMâ€™s are open if you want unfiltered PH Launch Tactics :)
